note:
Curiosity is a wonderful thing.

Lived in several countries long enough to understand (at least a year), visited many others.
I enjoy the contrasts.
Constantly awed by magnificent views and the wonders of the outdoors.
I'll mostly joke around and that doesn't mean I'm not serious (to butcher G B Shaw)

On my third career, not doing what I love, simply aiming to love what I do until I get bored.
